page.title: 19GEN. SIR JOHN CONT.
page.content: was persuaded to publish it in 1977. He has written a book called "The Third World War".It has been printed in lots of different languages.It describes what Sir John thinks a Third World War would be like.Sir John is very busy.At the moment he is writing a Medieval History.During the war he parachuted into Holland to fight the battle of Arnhem .It was very peaceful going down.There was no noise.Sir John quite enjoyed it but in the end landed with a bump!He always carried a walking stick but dropped it on the way down! Some Germans surrendered but he wouldn't arrest them til he had his stick.A shell exploded and some shrapnel got into his leg and stomach. He was evacuated to St.Elizabeth hospital.In the streets as he was going to hospital there was a lot of shooting and fighting.From the hospit-
